      Gets request path: the part of the URI without the query string (and the trailing '?').

      Gets query string: the part of the URI after the '?' sign.

      Returns the address of the remote host.

      Gets request URI (request path with query string).
      java.lang.String getResourcePath()
      Returns the path bound to the resource, handling this request.
      java.net.Socket getSocket()
      Gets the socket on which the client is connected.

      Gets the request version.

      • getMethod

        java.lang.String getMethod()
        Gets request method (e.g. GET, POST, HEAD).
        Returns:
        The query string.

      • getRequestURI

        java.lang.String getRequestURI()
        Gets request URI (request path with query string).
        Returns:
        The query string.

      • getPathName

        java.lang.String getPathName()
        Gets request path: the part of the URI without the query string (and the trailing '?').
        Returns:
        The query string.

      • getQueryString

        java.lang.String getQueryString()
        Gets query string: the part of the URI after the '?' sign.
        Returns:
        The query string.

      • getVersion

        java.lang.String getVersion()
        Gets the request version. (e.g. HTTP/1.1)
        Returns:
        Array containing the values for all header lines with this key.

      • getHeaders

        java.lang.String[] getHeaders(java.lang.String key)
        Returns header fields with this identifier.
        Parameters:
        key - Header key.
        Returns:
        Array containing the values for all header lines with this key.

      • getHeader

        java.lang.String getHeader(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the last header field with this identifier.
        Parameters:
        key - Header key.
        Returns:
        The latest request header line with the given key.

      • getParameters

        java.lang.String[] getParameters(java.lang.String key)
        Returns all the get parameters with this identifier (in the order of appearance).
        Parameters:
        key - Key in the query string.
        Returns:
        Array containing the values for all get variables with this key.

      • getParameter

        java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the latest get parameter with this identifier.
        Parameters:
        key - Key in the query string.
        Returns:
        The latest get variable with the given key.

      • getResourcePath

        java.lang.String getResourcePath()
        Returns the path bound to the resource, handling this request.
        Returns:
        The latest get variable with the given key.

      • getRemoteAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getRemoteAddress()
        Returns the address of the remote host.
        Returns:
        The address of the remote host.

      • getInputStream

        java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
        Gets input stream to retrieve the request body.
        Returns:
        InputStream with the request body.

      • getSocket

        java.net.Socket getSocket()
        Gets the socket on which the client is connected.
        Returns:
        Socket on which the user is connected of null if not an HTTP connection.
